com.fluxicon.slickerbox.ui
Class SlickerProgressBarUI

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      javax.swing.plaf.ProgressBarUI
          javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicProgressBarUI
              com.fluxicon.slickerbox.ui.SlickerProgressBarUI

public class SlickerProgressBarUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicProgressBarUI

Slicker replacement for JProgressBarUI - renders a progress bar in the style of an LED VU-meter, as found in vintage audio equipment. Why? Because we can..

Author:
Christian W. Guenther (christian@deckfour.org)
